reviews.text:
I visited a restaurant in Copenhagen, right next to my hotel, and had a wonderful experience. Initially, I went at night and enjoyed a strong and pleasant drink. The staff was really helpful, and they even offered free Wi-Fi and outdoor seating. The ordering process was simple, and they served the food directly to the table.

The next morning, I returned for a meal and tried their omelette with harissa sauce and bacon from the brunch menu. The food was delicious, and the coffee was decent. Overall, it's a cozy place with great food and drinks, and I would definitely recommend it to anyone visiting Copenhagen.

We were 4 days in Copenhagen and 2 evenings in the Kalaset. With over 50, we pushed the age average up a lot, but it was absolutely worth it. The food is simply fantastic. Sophisticated and yet honest. Simple and yet very surprising. The service is very friendly and competent. Thank you. We are looking forward to next time.
Cozy place, friendly stuff, mouth-orgasm worthy brunch, definitely cooked and plated with love. And those fluffy pancakes were exquisitely! I'll be back.

Stopped by here on a Friday morning for brunch. The food was fantastic and well prepared. The indoor area was decorated with vintage radios and recorders, which really added to the atmosphere. Highly recommend!
Tasty and nice brunch place. Cosy inside, also tables outside when the weather is good. Recommended
